title: Baghdad
author: Baghdad
content: I've scanned through the forum, not all boards, but only few questions and answers is unattended, not treated or can't be found on different cryptocurrency blogs, reddits etc. Pondering on it, members have unique reasons why they'll read, search for answers, or ask question in this forum, in the face of the answers already written on other quality alternative question and answer forums, cryptocurrency blogs, and social medias.I will add that the forum breaks answers down into understandable terms to quicken the learning process of a dummie or lay man in cryptocurrency.  Gave out time reading on blogs, reddits etc, but bitcointalk provides a simple method of teaching or writing answers that's not yet beaten by any platform that I've read. Your well broken and detailed answers, could add extra meaning to this thread, my thoughts and resolve or put an end to an extra minute spent basking in thoughts about this question. Cheers

comments.body: Quote from: Baghdad on August 23, 2023, 02:54:27 PMI've scanned through the forum, not all boards, but only few questions and answers is unattended, not treated or can't be found on different cryptocurrency blogs, reddits etc. Pondering on it, members have unique reasons why they'll read, search for answers, or ask question in this forum, in the face of the answers already written on other quality alternative question and answer forums, cryptocurrency blogs, and social medias.I will add that the forum breaks answers down into understandable terms to quicken the learning process of a dummie or lay man in cryptocurrency.  Gave out time reading on blogs, reddits etc, but bitcointalk provides a simple method of teaching or writing answers that's not yet beaten by any platform that I've read. Your well broken and detailed answers, could add extra meaning to this thread, my thoughts and resolve or put an end to an extra minute spent basking in thoughts about this question. CheersWell you get those points for the answer of this topic. Actually getting answers from this forum feels simpler and easier to understand. Instead of having to read long articles with convoluted and circling language that makes us tired and lazy to read because articles are difficult to arrive at the answers we want. Finding answers here also gives us the freedom to respond again if there are still things we don't understand. So often the discussion becomes quite long. And learning through discussion is actually easier to remember. Rather than learning through the interaction of 1 party. 2-party interaction is a more effective method. But apart from all that, it will still come back to each individual. I personally read from the internet and then ask here if there is something I don't understand from what I read on blogs or other articles. And conversely, sometimes we also help answer questions here by attaching the answers we get from reading in articles on other news or educational sites out there, including sources, of course.

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: Quote from: Baghdad on August 23, 2023, 02:54:27 PMI've scanned through the forum, not all boards, but only few questions and answers is unattended, not treated or can't be found on different cryptocurrency blogs, reddits etc. How did you engage your search engine on the forum, the keywords used or phrase and so on, also don't compare this forum with other online social media platforms all aspects of cryptocurrency may not have been discussed through the means you're searching from, that's why search engine is necessary for areas already discussed which means not every aspects would have been discussed.Quote from: Baghdad on August 23, 2023, 02:54:27 PMI will add that the forum breaks answers down into understandable terms to quicken the learning process of a dummie or lay man in cryptocurrency.The search engine already had the category of where to search from, it's either from the google or forum search, when you choose the section you want, you can also provide the user name of any forum member if you know any author in such regard.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Well, from my perspective, online forum like bitcointalk.org offer a certain dose of authenticity that's hard to beat. You're communicating with actual users, not just reading curated content. It's like tapping into a collective knowledge pool, and sometimes the back-and-forth discussions can really uncover insights that might not be found elsewhere. And, in my opinion, the interactive nature lets you throw in specific questions and get answers that feel more tailored compared to other platforms.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: QuoteRe: Why do you prefer getting answers here?People prefer to get answers here rather than on Google because it all comes from individual opinion, as everyone will give answers based on what they understand and on personal experience, so you, as the person who asks the question, will have different choices to make from the responses of different members, and the answers that are given are also verified by others so that the inquirer is not misled.And secondly, not every question can be answered by Google or any search engine with a detailed explanation of how you might understand it, but here in the forum you are given a lot of choices to choose from.

comments.author: Raceonsucced
comments.body: Yes, this forum is filled with experienced and knowledgeable people. If there's something we don't understand, just ask. Then there will be different answers and opinions from everyone. Make everyone in the forum able to share opinions and knowledge.
